title: Senior Software Engineer
description: We're looking for a Senior Software Engineer to help build and scale our AI-powered career platform. You'll work across the full stack, designing and implementing features that help millions of job seekers find their ideal roles.
requirements: 5+ years of professional software development experience
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and React
Experience with Node.js and RESTful API design
Familiarity with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable web applications
Collaborate with product and design teams to ship features
Mentor junior engineers and conduct code reviews
Contribute to architectural decisions and technical roadmap
Optimize application performance and reliability

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Join our AI team to build and deploy machine learning models that power personalized job matching. You'll work on NLP, recommendation systems, and large-scale data pipelines.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in machine learning engineering
Strong Python programming skills
Experience with NLP and transformer-based models
Familiarity with ML frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow)
Experience deploying models to production
responsibilities: Develop and train ML models for job-resume matching
Build data pipelines for feature engineering
Evaluate and improve model performance metrics
Collaborate with engineering to integrate models into products
Stay current with latest ML research and techniques

title: Product Designer
description: We're seeking a Product Designer to craft intuitive, delightful experiences for our career platform. You'll own the design process end-to-end, from research and ideation to high-fidelity prototypes.
requirements: 3+ years of product design experience
Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centered design
Proficiency in Figma and modern design tools
Experience with design systems and component libraries
Understanding of accessibility best practices
responsibilities: Lead design for key product features and flows
Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
Collaborate closely with engineering and product teams
Maintain and evolve the design system

title: VP of Engineering
description: We're looking for a VP of Engineering to lead our growing engineering organization. You'll set technical strategy, build world-class teams, and ensure we deliver exceptional products at scale.
requirements: 12+ years of software engineering experience, 5+ in leadership
Track record of scaling engineering teams (50+ engineers)
Experience with AI/ML product development
Strong understanding of distributed systems architecture
MBA or advanced technical degree preferred
responsibilities: Define and execute the engineering vision and strategy
Recruit, develop, and retain top engineering talent
Drive engineering culture, processes, and best practices
Partner with CEO and product leadership on roadmap
Oversee technical architecture and infrastructure decisions

title: Junior Frontend Developer

Eagerness to learn and grow
Strong communication skills

2+ years of ICU/critical care experience

Strong clinical assessment skills
